select count(ROWNM) from TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_LINES where status = 'N'
select SO_NUM from TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_LINES where STATUS = 'N' order by rownum
select RCTLA_ATR6 from TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_LINES where STATUS = 'N' order by rownum
select INV_NUM from TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_LINES where STATUS = 'N' order by rownum
select INV_LINE_ID from TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_LINES where STATUS = 'N' order by rownum

create table TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_SPLITTED_LN as (SELECT distinct (select seq_id from TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_LINES where so_num='#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_INV_SO_NUM' and inv_num='#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INV_NUM' and inv_line_id ='#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INV_LINE_ID') SEQ_ID,A.CONTRACT_NUM, A.CONTRACT_LINE_NUM, A.BILL_PLAN_ID, A.BPLAN_LN_NBR, A.PRODUCT_ID, A.DESCR, A.GROSS_AMT,C.EVENT_OCCURRENCE,--,a.*, A.GROSS_AMT*(select sum (amount) from SYSADM.PS_CA_BP_EVENTS@psrevrec C where C.CONTRACT_NUM='#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_INV_SO_NUM' --SO_NUM And C.EVENT_OCCURRENCE=SUBSTR('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6', INSTR('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6',',', 1, 2)+1, INSTR('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6',',',1,3)-INSTR('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6',',',1,2)-1) --3rd field from attribute6 And C.BILL_PLAN_ID=substr('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6',1,INSTR('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6',',',1,1)-1) --1st field from attribute6 )/(select sum(gross_amt) FROM SYSADM.PS_CA_BP_LN_DTL_VW@psrevrec A where A.CONTRACT_NUM='#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_INV_SO_NUM' and a.bill_plan_id=c.bill_plan_id) transaction_line_amt FROM SYSADM.PS_CA_BP_LN_DTL_VW@psrevrec A, SYSADM.PS_CA_BP_EVENTS@psrevrec C WHERE (A.CONTRACT_NUM = '#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_INV_SO_NUM'--SO_NUM and C.EVENT_OCCURRENCE=SUBSTR('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6', INSTR('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6',',', 1, 2)+1, INSTR('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6',',',1,3)-INSTR('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6',',',1,2)-1) --3rd field from attribute6 -- and c.amount<>0 AND A.CONTRACT_NUM = C.CONTRACT_NUM and a.bill_plan_id =substr('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6',1,INSTR('#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INVOICE_ATR6',',',1,1)-1) --1st field from attribute6 AND A.BILL_PLAN_ID = C.BILL_PLAN_ID ))

SELECT Round(SUM(EXT_SLL_PRC),4) FROM TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_LINES where so_num='#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_INV_SO_NUM' and inv_num ='#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INV_NUM' and inv_line_id ='#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INV_LINE_ID'

UPDATE TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_LINES SET STATUS ='Y',PROCESSED_FLAG ='C',ERR_MSG = 'Master Row Completed Splitting' where SO_NUM = '#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_INV_SO_NUM' and INV_NUM = '#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INV_NUM' and inv_line_id = '#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_PSFT_INV_LINE_ID'
select count(ROWNM) from TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_LINES where status = 'N'
UPDATE TEMP_INV_PSFT_ZERO_LINES SET STATUS ='Y',PROCESSED_FLAG ='E',ERR_MSG = 'Master Row Not Completed Splitting..Transaction amount not matching' where SO_NUM = '#GLOBAL.V_REVREC_INV_SO_NUM'
delete from TEMP_C_APC_REV_CONV_INV_PRC where TYPE IN ('INV','CM') and SO_LINE_NUM = 0 and ATR1 = 'PS CONTRACTS'
select START_DATE from ODI_DYNAMIC_VALUES where VALUE = 'EXTRACT_DATE'
select END_DATE from ODI_DYNAMIC_VALUES where VALUE = 'EXTRACT_DATE'
select FLAG from ODI_DYNAMIC_VALUES WHERE VALUE ='EXTRACT_DATE'

---Added column "NOT_FOR_REVPRO" --Added period_date --update query to get PO number issue fix. --Added fixes for org_id join for RCTLA. --Added fix for Transaction type (Not to send to REVPRO) --Adding changes for Freight item, product hierarchy field. --adding start date and end date condition for GL Date --Fix issue for COGS Accounts for CM --DATE1 is null, get it from period_date --merge column for prod_hierarchy --merge column for cust_acct_sites --Look for invoices with sysdate-2 : Date:10/10/2017 --ATR20: Item Description : Date: 10/10/2017 create table TEMP_C_APC_REV_CONV_INV_PRC AS (SELECT 0 ID, 0 RC_ID, rctta.TYPE, 0 UPLOAD_ID, 'N' PROCESSED_FLAG, 0 ERR_MSG, 'Y' CV_ELIGIBLE_FLAG, --Need confirmation 0 BATCH_ID, 0 BOOK_ID, (SELECT hp.party_name FROM apps.hz_cust_accounts@erprevrec hca, apps.hz_parties@erprevrec hp WHERE hca.cust_account_id = rct.bill_to_customer_id AND hca.party_id = hp.party_id) CSTMR_NM, 0 DISC_ADJ_FLAG, --rctla.LINE_TYPE, DECODE (rbs.name, 'PS CONTRACTS', NULL, (SELECT ORDERED_QUANTITY * UNIT_LIST_PRICE FROM apps.oe_order_lines_all@erprevrec oela1 WHERE oela1.linE_id = rctla.INTERFACE_LINE_ATTRIBUTE6 and oela1.org_id=rctla.org_id)) EXT_LST_PRC, rctla.EXTENDED_AMOUNT EXT_SLL_PRC, 0 DISC_AMT, 0 DISC_PCT, 0 ALCTBL_XT_PRC, --rctla.inventory_item_id, (SELECT segment1 FROM apps.mtl_system_items@erprevrec msi WHERE 1 = 1 AND msi.inventory_item_id = rctla.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND msi.organization_id = 102) ITEM_NUM, 0 BNDL_CNFG_ID, rctla.QUANTITY_CREDITED * -1 RET_QTY, rctla.QUANTITY_INVOICED INV_QTY, rctla.quantity_ordered ORD_QTY, 0 LT_DEF_ACNT, rct.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE CURR, sob.currency_code F_CUR, --rct.EXCHANGE_DATE , NVL (rct.EXCHANGE_RATE, 1) F_EX_RATE, DECODE ( sob.currency_code, 'USD', 1, (SELECT conversion_rate FROM apps.gl_daily_rates@erprevrec WHERE conversion_type = 'Corporate' AND from_currency = sob.currency_code AND to_currency = 'USD' AND TRUNC (conversion_date) = TRUNC (rct.trx_date)) ) G_EX_RATE, DECODE (rctta.TYPE, 'CM', 'Y', 'N') RETURN_FLAG, DECODE (rbs.name, 'PS CONTRACTS', rctla.attribute3, NULL) START_DATE, DECODE (rbs.name, 'PS CONTRACTS', rctla.attribute4, NULL) END_DATE, 0 duration, 'N' STANDALONE_FLAG, 0 STATED_FLAG, (SELECT DISTINCT gcc.CONCATENATED_SEGMENTS FROM apps.RA_CUST_TRX_LINE_GL_DIST_ALL@erprevrec rctl, apps.GL_CODE_COMBINATIONS_kfv@erprevrec gcc WHERE rctl.customer_trx_line_id = rctla.customer_trx_line_id AND rctl.percent = 100 AND rctl.account_class = 'REV' AND rctl.posting_control_id <> -3 AND rctl.CODE_COMBINATION_ID = gcc.code_combination_id AND rctl.customer_trx_id = rct.customer_trx_id AND rctl.org_id = rct.org_id ) DEF_SEGMENTS, 0 rev_SEGMENTS, DECODE ( rbs.name, 'PS CONTRACTS', 'PS CONTRACTS', (SELECT ottt.name FROM apps.oe_transaction_types_all@erprevrec otta, apps.OE_TRANSACTION_TYPES_TL@erprevrec ottt, apps.oe_order_headers_all@erprevrec oeh1,
